basics.name: Thomas Quettier
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher, Psychologist
basics.summary: Postdoctoral researcher and licensed psychologist specializing in emotion recognition, facial mimicry, and sensorimotor integration. Experienced in EEG, TMS, EMG, and behavioral paradigms across clinical and non-clinical populations.

location.address: via del Borgo di San Pietro

work.name: University of Bologna
work.summary: Research project: Uncovering the Neural Basis of Authentic Emotion Recognition.

work.name: University of Padova
work.summary: Course: General Psychology Methods in Psychological Science (First Cycle Degree).

work.name: Member of the Emilia-Romagna board of Psychologist (Italy)
work.summary: Licensed psychologist with full registration in Emilia-RegiItaly (nationally recognised licence), Emilia-Romagna, Italy. Registration number: 11581. State exam score: 100/100.

work.name: University of Bologna
work.summary: Research project: The influence of emotions on actions: Boosting brain network plasticity to ameliorate action control.

work.name: University of Padova
work.summary: Research project: Unraveling the unique role of the embodied route for emotional face processing.

work.name: University of Padova
work.summary: Psychological and neuropsychological testing as part of clinical and research activities.

work.name: University of Padova
work.summary: Research project: The binocular rivalry paradigm to study the relationship between consciousness and facial expression processing.

work.name: Institut des Sciences Cognitives Marc Jeannerod, CNRS
work.summary: Research on tool use in macaques and spike data analysis.

work.name: University College London
work.summary: EEG and electrical stimulation studies in pain and perception.

work.name: South London and Maudsley NHS Foundation Trust
work.summary: Observation in behavioral genetics and adult ADHD clinics.

work.name: Birkbeck College, University of London
work.summary: Tactile stimulation study on body representation.

awards.title: National French Qualification for Associate Professorship (CNU 16)
awards.awarder: French Ministry of Higher Education and Research
awards.summary: National qualification required to apply for permanent academic positions (Maître de conférences) in Psychology (Section 16) at French universities.

awards.title: Post-doctoral Fellowship (~€24,000)
awards.awarder: University of Padova, Department of Developmental Psychology and Socialisation
awards.summary: Competitive post-doctoral research grant (assegno di ricerca di tipo A) awarded for a 3-year project in psychological sciences.

awards.title: PhD Fellowship (~€59,000)
awards.awarder: Italian Ministry of Universities and Research (MUR)
awards.summary: State scholarship (Borsa di Stato) awarded through national competitive selection for doctoral studies at the University of Padova.

awards.title: Tuition Fee Waiver (€981)
awards.summary: Awarded through the 'Bando per l’attribuzione di esoneri dai contributi studenteschi' for students with foreign qualifications enrolling in Italian-taught programmes.

awards.title: EXPLO’RA Sup Grant (€3800)
awards.summary: Competitive mobility grant for a 10-month research internship at the University of Padova.

awards.title: ERASMUS+ Grant (€3000)
awards.summary: 10-month mobility grant for research training at the University of Padova under the supervision of Prof. Francesca Peressotti.
